name: CodeDiff
description: Allows you to specify an array of changes to make up a complete code or ASCII file diff, and includes a description of those changes. You must NEVER double-escape content in this diff.

path.description: The original filename and ABSOLUTE path where the changes are to occur

description.description: A human-readable explanation of this specific change

change_type.description: The type of change that occurred

lineNumber.description: The line number where the change starts, adjusted for previous changes in this changeset (not used for file creation, replacement, renaming, or deletion)

oldContent.description: The lines that were removed or modified (ignored for createFile, replaceFile, renameFile, and deleteFile)

newContent.description: The lines that were added, modified, or created (for replaceFile, this contains the entire new file content; for renameFile, this contains the new file path)
